summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.5°C) and outside temperature (down 5.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11232 lux) and cloud levels (up 716 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12986 lux) and cloud levels (up 1663 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 715.5m lower than yesterday, 647.1m lower than the past week, 1662.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 1059m and a peak of 3380m, averaging 1008.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
